name: Drizzle
description:
Game made in 48 hours by Jackson Majewski, Ben Sultzer, Yazz Miller, and Chris Stehlar for the Global Game Jam

Uses:

BBC Sound Effects

Mixamo Animations

Soom TinyFire VFX 1.0

Team XS Blue Sedan

Galactic Studios Ultra Skybox Fog

Digital Rugby (Jeff Johnson)

Elcanetay Low Poly Nature - FREE Vegetation

Broken Vector Low Poly Tree Pack

No clue why walking animations are broken, unity just be like that. Gonna try and rebuild with a different version but there's not really a lot of time so lol
